description:
Cerebro is an productivity booster with a brain...

it is an open source and free electron-based productivity software alternative to Alfred and Spotlight.

## Features ##

### Search everything ###

![search](https://cerebroapp.com/images/search.png)

Search everything in few clicks. On your machine or in the Internet.

Interact with everything: open file in default program or reveal in finder, copy contact details to clipboard, see google suggestions.

### See everything ###

![see-everything](https://cerebroapp.com/images/previews.png)

Maps, translations, files. Now you don’t have to open another application to see what you need.

Everything is in one place.

### Do everything ###

![plugins](https://cerebroapp.com/images/plugins.png)

Using included plugin manager you always can find and use what you want.

There is no plugin that you are looking for? Use simple, but powerful [API](https://github.com/KELiON/cerebro/blob/master/docs/plugins.md) to build your own plugins and share them with community.

### Open source ###

![open-source](https://cerebroapp.com/images/open-source.png)

Cerebro is free and open-source.

Be a part of community: contribute your
improvements, suggestions and fixes.
summary: Cerebro is an open source and free electron-based productivity software alternative to Alfred and Spotlight.
author: Alexandr Subbotin
